article.title: Telephonics Receives Follow-on Contract from the Air Force for TruLink Wireless Intercommunication Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Telephonics Corporation has been awarded a $2 million follow-on contract from the U.S. Air Force for TruLink Wireless Intercommunication Systems. The TruLink system will be used by Aeromedical Evacuation (AE) teams to provide clear voice communications between team members, thereby enhancing the safe transport and care of patients aboard military aircraft.
